# 🌟 Feature Documentation

## Core Features

### 💾 Backup System

#### Configuration Backup
- System configuration files
- Add-on settings
- User preferences
- Custom keymaps
- Network settings

**Usage:**
1. Select backup components
2. Choose destination
3. Start backup process
4. Verify completion

#### Automated Scheduling
- Hourly/Daily/Weekly options
- Custom time selection
- Retention policy
- Error handling

**Configuration:**
```
Settings → Scheduling:
- Enable scheduling
- Set frequency
- Choose backup time
- Set retention period
```

### 🔄 Backup Management

#### Backup Organization
- Timestamp-based naming
- Category sorting
- Size management
- Version control

#### Retention Control
- Maximum backup limit
- Age-based cleanup
- Space-based cleanup
- Priority retention

### 🛡️ Data Protection

#### Verification System
- Integrity checking
- File comparison
- Size verification
- Manifest validation

#### Error Recovery
- Automatic retry
- Partial backup recovery
- Corruption detection
- Backup redundancy
